hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: If one enters a horse with two others when he is not certain that it cannot be beaten, it is not gambling; but when one enters a horse with two others when he is certain it cannot be beaten, it is gambling

chapter.eng-name: Regarding Al-Muhallil (Entering A Third Horse In A Race With Two Other Horses For A Stake)
